Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Garfield/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Michigan, 57th, Perry, & Garfield, due to street blockage near Garfield/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Michigan, 57th, Perry, then resume their normal route on Garfield, due to street blockage near Garfield/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing Grand due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing Grand due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
